_meanings:
{@--1@} A bivalve shell  
({#SaMbUkA#} also in this sense).

{@--4@} The
edge of the frontal protuberance of
an elephant.

{@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Śūdra (who
practised penance though forbidden
to his caste and was in consequence
slain by Rāma; see {%inter alia%} <ls>U. 2.</ls>
and <ls>R. 15</ls>).
